title: The Promised Land
provenance_text:
Louis Bouché [1896-1969]; C. W. Kraushaar Art Galleries, New York, NY, 1939; Louise and Roland P. Murdock, Wichita, KS, 1940; C. W. Kraushaar Art Galleries, New York, NY, 1942 until November 1943; Charles J. Rosenbloom [1898-1973], Pittsburgh, PA (Lugt Suppl. 633b), November 1943 until April 1, 1973 [1]; bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, February 1974.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was exhibited in the 1943 "Painting in the United States" exhibition at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October-December 1943 (no. 10; illustrated in plate 58.) Mr. Rosenbloom purchased the painting from the exhibition for $425 (his check dated November 17, 1943.)  See also "American Paintings and Sculpture to 1945 in the Carnegie Museum of Art," page 103.

creator.birth_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
